column2: (with-temp-buffer (insert (concat " a" (string 10) " b" (string 10))) (setq buffer-read-only t) (condition-case err (indent-region (point-min) (point-max) 0) (error (car err))))

(let ((orig (default-value 'buffer-read-only))) (unwind-protect (progn (setq-default buffer-read-only t) (with-temp-buffer (condition-case err (indent-for-tab-command) (error (car err))))) (setq-default buffer-read-only orig)))
